gale:repo.gale:text: When using this application you will be presented with several questions and scenarios regarding your personal and professional life. After answering all questions, you will get a personalized advice on how to deal with the symptoms of burnout you might show. Eventually, you can reflect on your own behavior and ideally change that behavior if necessary.

div.p: First you will be presented with one of the questions. This can be either a textual question, or an image. Upon answering the question, you will be redirected to a different question. The order of questions you will see is based on the answers you provide.
Questions can be displayed textually or in image-form. If you would like to switch the way questions are displayed, you can click the 'Show as image' or 'Show as text' buttons under the question.
Throughout the questionaire, a red badge will appear at the bottom right of your screen. This badge can be clicked to display a joke to help you stick your attention to the application.

After you completed all your questions, you will be presented with an overview of stressors that could be causing a burnout. Useful tips will be given to help you stay stress-free and handle work-related problems in your life.

gale:repo.gale:text: If you know how to use this system, you can continue to the question pages.
